__label__Environment nsengimana olivier watangije umushinga kwita misambi gucika yahawe igihembo mpuzamahanga kubungabunga urusobe ibinyabuzima kizwi future for nature award 2019a nsengimana olivier watangije umushinga kwita misambi gucika yahawe igihembo mpuzamahanga kubungabunga urusobe ibinyabuzima kizwi future for nature award 2019a munyarwanda 34 fernanda abra ukomoka bresil umuhinde divya karnad batoranyijwe azahabwa 50000 amaeuro akabakaba 50 frw nsengimana yahembwe bagera 125 bagaragaje imishinga kubungabunga urusobe ibinyabuzima umushinga watsinze guteza imyororokere kurinda imisambi igenda izimira igihembo future for nature ffn yahawe azagishyikirizwa birori bizabera pariki nto royal burgersa zooa arnhem buholandi 4 gicurasi 2019 nsengimana yabwiye gihembo kizamufasha kongera kubungabunga urusobe ibinyabuzima birashimishije sinjye wahembwe igihembo umushinga ishimwe dukorana rufite umwihariko kwihutisha imikoranire inzego umusaruro ukagaragara gito yakomeje rufite ubushake kubungabunga urusobe ibinyabuzima kivugwa birashimishije bizamura isura yacyo nsengimana amazemo ine kubungabunga ibinyabuzima abifatanya harwanywa ubucuruzi imisambi butumwa ihigwa imishinga ihanzwe amaso kubungabunga imisambidr nsengimana wabaye umuganga ingagi yatangije kirengera inyamaswa gasozi rwca 2014 inyamaswa ziri gucika zirimo imisambi igitekerezo umusanzu kubungabunga imisambi iyapfuye bayihiga iyagejejwe igakatwa amababa bigatuma itisanzura bikwiye rwca abakozi 15 abakorerabushake 55 bafasha kubungabunga imisambi yarimo ikendera kuyicuruza binyuranye amategeko kureba irya tumenya kongera habarurwa imisambi 500 gasozi irimo iyari isanzwemo iyasubijweyo 2016 igikorwa kuyibarura kirakomeje basabwa kukigiramo uruhare muganga yatanze kudatunga imisambi nyamaswa gasozi ntibyemewe keretse ababifitiye uburenganzira inyamaswa zishobora kuzana uburwayi bwakwanduza imiryango abafite imisambi bataramenyekanisha byaba byiza bayibaruje igiye gukurwa abazaba __label__Culture murenge kansi gisagara hagaragara ibitare imihigoa abahatuye bazi amateka yaho ariho umwami kigeli iv rwabugili watwaye 1853 1895 yakundaga kuruhukira kumwe ingabo ze zikahakinira __label__Culture mugoroba gatanu 28 gashyantare 2020 fally ipupa yakoreye igitaramo gikomeye paris bufaransa abagera 30 batawe yombi guteza imvururu gitaramo cyari bagambiriye kubuza kukitabira igitaramo cyanjye kitazibagirana 28 gashyantare 2020 urukundo rwanyu rwatumye twongera kwandika amateka mashya ndihanganisha abatabashije kwinjira tuzasubira ndabakunda habanje akaduruvayo fally ipupa yishimiye igitaramo cyagenze merci aux 20 000 personnes qui hier soir ont rendu cette soiree du 28 02 2020 inoubliable votre determinationvotre courage mais surtout votre amour ont permis de reecrire une nouvelle histoire mes regrets les plus sinceres a tous ceux et celles qui ont pas pu acceder a la interieur de la salle ce est que partie remise je vous aime thank you to all the 20000 people who made last night an unforgettable evening your determination your courage but above all your love made it possible to rewrite history my most sincere regrets to all those of you that were unable to access the arena will do it again love you guys so much swetlife onelove fallyaccordhotelsarena2020a post shared by fally ipupa fallyipupa01 on feb 29 2020 at 204am psthafi ahagombaga igitaramo __label__Culture hasohotse igitabo cyiswe nuit brouillard sur le rwandaa ugenekereje kinyarwanda ijoro uje ibihua gikubiyemo inyandiko zanditswe umufaransa chatain wakoreraga igitangazamakuru lhumanite hakorwaga ubwicanyi jenoside yakorewe abatutsi 1994 hasohotse igitabo cyiswe nuit brouillard sur le rwandaa ugenekereje kinyarwanda ijoro uje ibihua gikubiyemo inyandiko zanditswe umufaransa chatain wakoreraga igitangazamakuru lhumanite hakorwaga ubwicanyi jenoside yakorewe abatutsi 1994 chatain kazi yakoze kagaragara mui gitabo kwerekana ukuntu ubugome burenze kamere bwari bwarinjijwe nterahamwe utundi dutsiko twakoraga ubwicanyi dufashijwe iriho tukaza kurwanywa izari ingabo fpr inkotanyi ngabo zagendaga zihura imirambo inzira zose udasize iyacaga akagera isoko nil bihura leon mugesera yarahanuye mitingi kabaya 1992 abatutsi bazatemwa bakanyuzwa iya ubusamo baciye ruzi nil bagana bakomoka abssinie ibyanditswe chatain usanga nyadiko gitabo bituma habaho kwibaza bufaransa bufaransa babaga boherejwe bihe babaga baje umwihariko yabaga itegurwa jenoside aha arabigarukaho bwimbitse nyandiko ze ziri gitabo bwimbitse chatain banyamakuru bake bageze jenoside yakorerwaga abatutsi batanze ubuhamya babonye kumenyekanisha ububi burenze kamere ibyabaga bibera ingabo fpr akaga bagendaga bahura nzira gushaka hagira urokoka gushaka guhagarika ubwicanyi munyamakuru yifuzaga gitabo cye gisohoka ntiyagize mahirwe yitabye 5 ukuboza 2019 akikirangiza gitabo kirimwo inyandiko bita iriburiro preface umwanditsi mateka jenoside yakorewe abatutsi uzwi bufaransa witwa jacques morel nawe ugikorera ubuvugizi bihe kiri gushyirwa yanditse igitabo kinini cyamenyekanye yise la france au cur du genocide des tutsia usangamo gatandatu 9 mata 1994 batangiye kwicwa ibiganiro kuwa 30 mata 1994 mulindi munyamakuru yagiranye fpr mgr rubwejanga mpunzi 800 ziciwe eveche 3 gicurasi 1994 ubuhamya bwatanzwe abapadiri bugome bwarimo bubera gatanu 6 gicurasi 1994 ikiganiro kagame yahaye abanyamakuru mupaka tanzania 9 gicurasi 1994 amaraso menshi yaramenetse ibya rutwitsi rtlm paji 75 gitabo unasangamo byabajijwe uwari wungirije fpr paji 89 ibohorwa umujyi byumba 11 gicurasi 1994 basaga 200 thank you hambara silverback visitrwanda liveforthestory canonnederland gorilla gorillas africa afrikaa post shared by humberto tan humbertotan on jan 15 2020 at 909pm pst wat een ervaring deze machtige berggorillaa s laten je gewoon toe in hun wereld wat mij vooral opviel hun zachte energie het dominante mannetje de silverback houdt alles goed in de gaten en grijpt in waar het nodig is normaal moeten mensen minimaal 7 meter afstand houden tenzij de gorillaa s de mens opzoeken of zij aangeven dat het oke is dat doen ze met een diepe brom hebben ruim 2 5 uur gelopen om ze te vinden masr het is het meer en meer dan waard gorillasa post shared by humberto tan humbertotan on jan 15 2020 at 442am pst

__label__Politics akarere rusizi buvuga umurenge nkombo ukigaragaramo umubare munini abatazi gusoma kwandika bituruka mateka mabi yaranze kiriya kirwa ribanza rimwe ryahabaga abahigaga __label__Culture umwanditsi inzobere politiki umujyanama kimonyo yagaragaje ibihe bikomeye bibi rwanyuzemo icyizere ibyagezweho bizasigasirwa urubyiruko rwongeye kwiyumvamo ubunyarwanda umwanditsi babashyize ahantu hatari guturwa kimonyo impunzi zakomeje guhanyanyaza 1960 zirisuganya zigaba ibitero byiswe ibya inyenzi ntibyazihira zakomeje kubaho buzima bubi mahanga bigeze 1980 haba politiki gutsindwa guverinoma twagiramungu kugumuka banyamuryango fprmuri muhuro kimonyo yagarutse bihe bikomeye politiki yanyuzemo jenoside yakorewe abatutsi hamaze gushyirwaho guverinoma ubumwe guverinoma igizwe amashyaka atarijanditse jenoside isonga arimo mdr twagiramungu faustin wagizwe intebe washize batangiye kwegura hashize amezi make igiyeho kutumvikana kimonyo kutumvikana kwatewe abari guverinoma ibyerekezo nyamara bagomba guha icyerekezo guveirnoma ubumwe gutsindwa kubiri ugutsindwa ukwa politiki batumvikanaga guverinoma fpr mdr impamvu zitandukanye umutekano cyari kiri gukemurwa mashyaka yombi ntiyari imigambi yabonaga ahazaza ha twagiramungu yeguye kanama 1995 bukeye bavanwa guverinoma kimonyo 19971998 haje kubaho ikindi kibazo kugumuka abayoboke fpr inkotanyi batangira kurya ruswa ishyaka haza umwuka mubi indi guverinoma yagiyeho nayo iza gutsindwa ibangamirwa banyamuryango fpr bagumutse 19971998 bamagana ruswa byari bitangiye gukomera fpr yahise ijya bihe bibi ishaka yabivamo havanwaho bakekwagaho ruswa byadindizaga guverinoma bimaze kuvaho nibwo hatangiye gutekerezwa hazaza ha hatangizwa ibiganiro urugwiro nabyo byacuriwemo icyerecyezo 2020 kiri gusozwa guverinoma ubumwe yarangiye 2003 hatorwaga itegeko nshinga hakaba amatora jenoside yarangira kimonyo yemeza urebye rugeze imyumvire urubyiruko rufite kabuza ibyagezweho bizakomeza gusigasirwa kongerwa urasanga rubyiruko rutangiye kwitabira umuco cyera haba gushinga fpr kurwanya igitugu kubaka umuco ubunyarwanda gukunda nibyo byari umusingi twashoboye kugeraho urasanga urubyiruko minsi rutangiye kwitabira ibya umuco yashishikarije urubyiruko rwitabira ibiganiro bigaruka byaranze rwige ibyagezweho byakozwe rwarushaho kubyongera uretse igitabo demain kimonyo asanganywe ikindi gitabo cyitwa un genocide populairea yasohoye 2008

akoresha kohereza butumwa ubwishingizi nabyo bizajya bihita bibona umukiliya wabyo wakoze impanukaubundi bishake umugenzuzi ujya kureba ikinyabiziga kimeze nawe akore raporo ayihe cyamutumye burning at a record rate right now and for the past 1819 days this is a world emergency and affects all of our security please post and tag unitednations a post shared by miguel miguel on aug 21 2019 at 831am pdt regram rg rainforestalliance the lungs of the earth are in flames the brazilian amazonhome to 1 million indigenous people and 3 million specieshas been burning for more than two weeks straight there have been 74000 fires in the brazilian amazon since the beginning of this yeara staggering 84 increase over the same period last year national institute for space research brazil scientists and conservationists attribute the accelerating deforestation to president jair bolsonaro who issued an open invitation to loggers and farmers to clear the land after taking office in january the largest rainforest in the world is a critical piece of the global climate solution without the amazon can not keep the eartha s warming in check the amazon needs more than our prayers so what can you do as an emergency response donate to frontline amazon groups working to defend the forest consider becoming a regular supporter of the rainforest alliancea s community forestry initiatives across the worlda s most vulnerable tropical forests including the amazon this approach is by far the most effective defense against deforestation and natural forest fires but it requires deep longterm collaboration between the communities and the public and private sectors stay on top of this story and keep sharing posts tagging news agencies and influencers be a conscious consumer taking care to support companies committed to responsible supply chains eliminate or reduce consumption of beef cattle ranching is one of the primary drivers of amazon deforestation when election time comes vote for leaders who understand the urgency of our climate crisis and are willing to take bold actionincluding strong governance and forwardthinking policy rainforestalliance savetheamazon prayforamazonia amazonrainforest actonclimate forestsresist climatecrisis mohsinkazmitakespictures windy coma post shared by leonardo dicaprio leonardodicaprio on aug 22 2019 at 712am pdt

bitari bituwe agiye guhaguruka asubira tanzania nyerere twiteguye kwakira 500 000 icya rimwe dufite ahantu hanini hadatuwe abazaza bazashyirwa midugudu izwi ujamaa nkuko banyatanzaniya bameze mushinga waheze mpapuro tanzania byari byawemeranyijeho ikiguzi cyose gutuza baturage cyari inyandiko ibanga amerika zerekana rwabigenzemo gahoro dore amikoro kubatuza yasaga menshi rushyira kuboneza urubyaro kuganira tanzania habyarimana yaciye undi muvuno kumvikana gabon abafite ubumenyi runaka bakajyanwa gutuzwa cyari cyugarijwe ubuke abakozi nzego nyinshi iza 30 nzeri 1976 habyarimana yagiriye uruzinduko gabon omar bongo basinya amasezerano ane ubufatanye arimo kohereza gabon bakagenda abakozi byari byitezwe isinywa masezerano impande zombi zizashyiraho komisiyo ihuriweho ishinzwe kuyashyira zunze ubumwe amerika zigaragaza mushinga nawo waje gupfuba gabon yagiye igaragaza ubushake buke kuwushyira byari biyoroheye banyamahanga batayihenze guteza uburezi ibone bayo ubumenyi bukenewe rwakomeje guhangana ubwiyongere hakoreshejwe kuboneza urubyaro umusaruro bitanga ukaba muke 1966 abaturarwanda bageraga eshatu bagenda bazamuka 1988 rwari rutuwe esheshatu 2018 rwari rutuwe abasaga 12 ibimenyetso byerekana bazakomeza kwiyongera 2032 bazaba bageze 16 9 biyongereye 15 4 baramutse baboneje urubyaro gishinzwe ibarurishamibare kigaragaza bazaba barikubye 2050 urebeye bwiyongere bariho 2 6
__label__Politics mezi make ashize misozi miremire minembwe kivu amajyepfo repubulika iharanira demokarasi congo hubuye ubugizi nabi bwibasiye bwoko abanyamulenge biganje batuye ako gace mezi make ashize misozi miremire minembwe kivu amajyepfo repubulika iharanira demokarasi congo hubuye ubugizi nabi bwibasiye bwoko abanyamulenge biganje batuye ako gace ubugizi nabi bukomoka bitero bagabwaho utangaza ubariyemo abahungiye tundi duce mahanga bagera bihumbi 200 mvururu ibitero bikabije byubuye nzeri abarwanyi mai mai bahukaga banyamulenge bakabasahura inka amaduka inzu nyinshi zigatwikwa barwana abasirikare barebera mai mai baraza bakabanyuramo bagatwika imihana inyuma bagafata inka bakazinyuza nkambi abasirikare mukiza yemeje ibiro komine bindi bice minembwe ahari ibirindiro ingabo congo nyamara ntacyo bakora bahagarike ibitero mai mai bateye abasirikare babagayo bigasa mai mai irushije ingufu ingabo nibyo tutumva moise nyarugabo umudepite uturuka minembwe yabwiye bbc bugizi nabi bakibwiye batandukanye felix tshisekedi bakabizeza kugikemura cyakozwe tshisekedi gushize ruzinduko burasirazuba yiteguye yapfa ako gace hakaboneka amahoro nyarugabo bugizi nabi bushobora __label__Culture amasano kinyarwanda amwe ashobora kuzimira hatabayeho bunoze kuyigisha abakiri bato nabo bazayahereze bazabyara amasano kinyarwanda amwe ashobora kuzimira hatabayeho bunoze kuyigisha abakiri bato nabo bazayahereze bazabyara kwinjirirwa indimi amahanga amasano nyarwanda agenda atakara ugasanga kwita mama wacua baramwita tante aunt mubyara wawe cousin ubusanzwe muco nyarwanda umwana muruta ubukuru nyito ikoreshwa bitsina byombi gore gabo wanjye tuvukana duhuje ababyeyi bombi ashobora avuka mwihariko mama se data ukuvuga tudasangiye ababyeyi bombi undi ushobora guhabwa sano uwa igitsinagabo ukomoka bavandimwe mama igitsinagore se abavandimwe data igitsinagabo anduta ubukuru nyito ikoreshwa bitsina byombi gore gabo sano ikoreshwa bakomoka data wacu se mama wacu nyito ikoreshwa bitsina byombi gore gabo wanjye mama wacu umuvandimwe unduta ubukuru akomoka mama wacu nyito ikoreshwa bitsina byombi gore gabo wanjye data wacu umuvandimwe nduta ubukuru akomoka data wacu nyito ikoreshwa bitsina byombi gore gabo murumuna wanjye mama wacu umuvandimwe nduta ubukuru akomoka mama wacu nyito ikoreshwa bitsina byombi gore gabo murumuna wanjye data wacu umuvandimwe nduta ubukuru akomoka data wacu nyito ikoreshwa bitsina byombi gore gabo amasano kurekuziguyemuramu wawe umuvandimwe umugore wawe nyito ikoreshwa bitsina byombi gabo gore sano ishobora se wabo umugore wawe sano abayifitanye muva inda ibitsina byombi muramukazi wawe igitsina gore uva inda umugabo wawe nyito ikoreshwa gitsina gore sano ishobora sewabo umugabo wawe sano ayifitanye muva inda ibitsina byombi mubyara wawe umukobwa se umuhungu uvuka nyokorome se nyogosenge sano ishobora bisanira sewabo nyokorome se nyogosenge amasano kure kutaziguyeumwinjira umugabo washatse mama wawe urupfu so akamutungira rugo so amutwaye iwe yabaye umugore undi umugabe babyaranye abavandimwe bawe musangiye amaraso mama wawe mukeba mama wawe undi mugore so se babyaranye abyaye bafitanye isano sano none igera bagore baramu bawe musanzire so igitsina gabo washatse muryango so agashaka nyokowanyu make abagore babo bavukana bakunze kubita abendahamwe bamuvutseho muba mufitanye isano bugufi mukaso umugore so ashobora yaramushatse umugore yarapfuye se akiriho babyaranye abavandimwe bawe musangiye amaraso so sobukwe umugabo ubyara mwashakanye nyito ikoreshwa ibitsina byombi sano irakomeza ikazagera bavukana kubo bava inda se wabo nyokobukwe umugore ubyara mwashakanye nyito ikoreshwa ibitsina byombi sano irakomeza ikazagera bavukana bava inda se wabo umukwe umugabo washatse umukobwa wawe sano irakomeza ikagera bavukana ikazagera bashatse abakobwa ubereye se wabo nyinawabo umukazana umugore washatswe umuhungu wawe sano irakomeza ikagera bavukana ikazagera bashatswe abagabo ubereye se wabo nyinawabo

__label__Environment richard kandt umuvumbuzi uzwi mateka akarere iburasirazuba yageze 1898 aje ubushakashatsi gushakisha isooko uruzi nile richard kandt umuvumbuzi uzwi mateka akarere iburasirazuba yageze 1898 aje ubushakashatsi gushakisha isooko uruzi nile avugwa iburasirazuba amateka azwi imisozi 1000 ruri yazengurutse kirekire yinjiriye burasirazuba bwarwo agera majyaruguru burengerazuba majyepfo ahingukira agirwa rezida warwo ngoma abakoloni urugendo rwe budage rwose nkuru igiye kuruva imuzi iragaruka guhera yinjiye arusohotsemo umwihariko inzira yanyuzemo amateka yahasize mugabo umusirikare umuganga wavukiye posen pologne 1867 yagiriye bihe amateka arigishwa hirya hino yanyuze duce nyaburanga dukurura abakerarugendo amateka agaragaza aza kandt yakunze gusoma ibitabo bivuga itegeko haracyari imbogamizi iya matora kamarampaka ashobora hatarakemuka agace somaliland kifata ukwacyo somalia igafata agace kayo bindi ivugurura itegeko nshinga rigomba kureba umurwa ukwiriye zigize bukorana nkuru ivugurura itegeko nshinga ritaraba tegeko rigenga amatora ntirizashoboka ntibashobora gutangira kwiyandikisha hataraboneka itegeko rigenga amatora naryo rigomba kugenwa itegeko nshinga indi mbogamizi umutekano muke igice kinini kiracyari maboko umutwe al shabaab bivuze hantu al shabaab amatora atazashoboka murwa mogadishu umutekano waho ntiwizewe bigaragazwa 28 ukuboza 2019 imodoka itezemo igisasu yaturikiye basakirwa murwa kigahitana 78 farmaajo gitero icya iterabwoba kitazihanganirwa icyakora abatavuga rumwe bamushinja kubembekereza al shabaab uduce yigaruriye guhera __label__Culture irasatira 76 umwami yuhi v musinga atanze yatanze 25 ukuboza 1944 atangiye buhungiro moba congo kwirukanwa ababiligi agasimbuzwa umuhungu mutara iii rudahigwa irasatira 76 umwami yuhi __label__Politics sheikh abdul karim harerimana umugabo 64 inararibonye politiki dore ayizi 1973 asoje ayisumbuye 1989 aruvamo 1994 arugarukamo kumwe fpr inkotanyi yahagaritse jenoside yakorewe __label__Politics 1974 1978 yagoye juvenal habyarimana kugarura umwuka umubano mwiza muryango ocam rwari rwahawe kuyobora 1974 1978 yagoye juvenal habyarimana kugarura umwuka umubano mwiza muryango __label__Opinion ushaka kumenya ahari ukuri guhishwa wumva ubwinshi ibinyoma bivugwa kintu nibyo rupfu juvenal habyarimana uzi ukwiye kubazwa urwo rupfu umugore wenda batari abasirikare bakuru ushaka kumenya ahari ukuri guhishwa wumva ubwinshi ibinyoma bivugwa kintu nibyo rupfu juvenal habyarimana uzi ukwiye kubazwa urwo rupfu umugore wenda batari abasirikare bakuru itariki 6 mata 2019 maradiyo akorera murandasi yagiranye ikiganiro bana bato habyarimana witwa luc habyarimana kiganiro muhungu yatangaje itariki 3 mata 1994 iwabo gasiza bakiriye ubutumwa budasanzwe buzanywe jacques roger boohbooh intumwa yihariye umunyamabanga abibumbye loni luc yiyumviye boohbooh abwira se aje amuzaniye ubutumwa buvuye mugaba ingabo inkotanyi kagame uzambwirire habyarimana nzamwica uwabazaga serge ndayizeye yagaragaje bintu bivuzwe 25 si ibya butumwa budasanzwe agatha kanziga umugore habyarimana nyina luc yarabibwiye ikinyamakuru jeune afrique gisohoka 17381739 28 mata15 gicurasi 1994 kanziga batumiye jacques roger boohbooh basangire pasika yabaye 3 mata kanziga akavuga ntumwa yihariye yasubiriyemo umugabo inshuro eshatu yatumwe kagame azamwica akoresheje bwose ibya butumwa bwitwa bwatanzwe intumwa yihariye umunyamabanga loni wahindutse iya umugaba inkotanyi yabisubiriyemo kambanda bahuriye nairobikenya 1995 anabyandika gitabo cye face a la apocalypse du 1994a bisobanura
